thread.title: Encore Bank Sun City Center Branch Manager James Wilmouth to retire
thread.title_full: Encore Bank Sun City Center Branch Manager James Wilmouth to retire - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Encore Bank Sun City Center Branch Manager James Wilmouth to retire
text:
Encore Bank Sun City Center Branch Manager James Wilmouth to retire
Sun City Center, FL, July 03, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Encore Bank Vice President and Sun City Center Branch Manager James Wilmouth will begin his well-earned retirement on June 30. Wilmouth has worked in banking in Florida for the past 43 years, and has spent the past decade with Encore Bank.
CEO Tom Ray said, “While everyone at Encore Bank will miss Jim, we’re excited for the many adventures ahead for him. We are grateful to his service to the bank, where he set an example for the kind of personal service and dedication that makes Encore unique.”
Wilmouth looks forward to spending time with his two grandchildren, ages seven and 10, who live nearby. He and his wife, Vickie, will also enjoy traveling, with trips planned to the Western United States and Italy. Wilmouth will continue to serve his community as an active member of the Sun City Center Rotary Club and through his church. In addition, he will stay involved with the Tampa Bay Water Ski Show Team, where his entire family have been longtime members.
Wilmouth said, “Encore Bank attracts outstanding customers who have made it a pleasure to come to work each and every day. Although I will miss seeing them, a lot of those customers told me about how great retirement is, so I thought I’d try it.”
Encore Bank has six convenient locations, including two branches in Naples at 3003 Tamiami Trail North and 2370 Vanderbilt Beach Road, Bonita Springs at 4450 Bonita Beach Road, Fort Myers at 7920 Summerlin Lakes Dr., Port Charlotte at 2120 Kings Highway, and Sun City Center at 1653 Sun City Center Plaza.
For more information, call 239.919.5888 or 239.594.3177 in Naples, 239.495.0243 in Bonita Springs, 239.278.5505 in Fort Myers, 941.258.3055 in Port Charlotte, or 813.634.8001 in Sun City Center, or visit www.encorebank.com. Member FDIC
